title: Discrete Mathematics 1
description: Questions related to the fundamentals of discrete mathematics, algorithms, and programming concepts.

questions.question: What is an information system?

answers.c: A system for collecting, processing, and storing information

questions.question: What is the primary role of an operating system?
What is an algorithm?

answers.c: A finite sequence of steps to solve a problem

questions.question: What is a basic characteristic of a good algorithm?
What does the input of an algorithm represent?

answers.b: The initial data of the algorithm

questions.question: What does the output of an algorithm represent?

answers.c: The result of processing input data

questions.question: Which control structure enables program branching?
Which control structure enables repetition of commands?
What is pseudocode?

answers.c: An informal description of an algorithm

questions.question: What is the purpose of a flowchart?
What is a variable?

answers.b: A name for a memory location

questions.question: What determines the data type of a variable?
What is the difference between a constant and a variable?

answers.c: The value of a constant does not change
answers.d: A variable does not occupy memory

questions.question: What is a program error (bug)?

answers.a: A correct part of the program
answers.c: An error in a program that causes incorrect behavior

questions.question: What is program testing?

answers.b: Checking the correctness of a program

questions.question: What is a programming language?

answers.b: A formal language for writing programs

questions.question: What is the purpose of a compiler?

answers.b: Translating source code into machine code

questions.question: What is an interpreted language?

answers.b: A language executed line by line

questions.question: What is program documentation?

answers.b: A description of program operation and usage

questions.question: Why is code readability important?

answers.c: It facilitates maintenance and understanding of the program
